abstract: Amer Friends of Brit plans Brit Red Cross and Irish Guards Regiment benefit
snippet: The first in a series of parties arranged by the newly organized American Friends of Britain for the benefit of the British Red Cross and the Irish Guards Regiment will take place next Sunday....

headline.main: American Friends of Britain to Entertain Next Sunday with Dance and Supper Party

lead_paragraph: The first in a series of parties arranged by the newly organized American Friends of Britain for the benefit of the British Red Cross and the Irish Guards Regiment will take place next Sunday.
